original_text: Abimelech and his men came to attack the tower. Abimelech went near to the door of the tower, to put a fire there.
korean_text: 아비멜렉이 망대 앞에 이르러 공격하며 망대의 문에 가까이 나아가서 그것을 불사르려 하더니

sentences.original_text: Abimelech and his men came to attack the tower.
sentences.korean_translation: 아비멜렉과 그의 부하들이 탑을 공격하러 왔다.

sentences.original_text: Abimelech went near to the door of the tower,
